Seytuu's Tech Bank

We are the makers of the culture "Automate and Chill!"

Powered by the latest tech like n8n, Supabase, Make, Hugging Face, and Loveable, we've created ready-to-deploy workflows to put your executions on autopilot while you work on what matters the most.

Hype

Hype is a hyper-personalized email writer that enables you to generate personalized emails for your leads in one deployment.

Learn More
Image Proofreader

Image proofreader enables you to proofread any image for spell check, capitalization, and any grammatical errors.

Learn More
LinkedIn Lead Enricher

This automation helps you scrape all details about a lead and its company using their LinkedIn Profile URL. This is best for LinkedIn Outreach.

Learn More
LinkedIn Intent Miner

We find intent by scraping comments off the relevant posts and prospecting leads as per your brand.
